name: Ahmad Whafa Azka Al Azkiyai
title: AI Security Researcher & Fraud Detection Specialist
tagline: Federated Learning Security | Adversarial ML | Privacy-Preserving AI

bio.short: AI Security Researcher & Fraud Detection Specialist with 3+ years experience. 67 completed projects across AI Security, Federated Learning, and Production AI. Published researcher focusing on trustworthy AI systems.
bio.long: AI Security Researcher & Fraud Detection Specialist with over 3 years of experience in banking fraud detection. My work focuses on securing federated learning systems against adversarial attacks while preserving data privacy through cryptographic techniques. I have completed 67 projects across AI Security, Federated Learning, and Production AI systems, with published research in steganography (Springer LNNS vol 285).

taglines: Building trustworthy AI systems through adversarial robustness
3+ years detecting financial fraud, now securing federated learning
Privacy-preserving machine learning for the next generation of AI
